webscript.description:
Gets metadata for an Account identified either by its ID or by the domain it uses. The metadata will look like: 
    {
       "data":
       {
          "id": 101,
          "name": "account name",
          "type": 0,
          "enabled" : true,
          "className": "PRIVATE_EMAIL_DOMAIN",
          "classDisplayName": "Private Email Domain",
          "creationDate": "2011-08-02T10:19:04.461+01:00",
          "usageQuota":
          {
             "fileSizeUQ": { "u" : 1024, "q" : 1073741824 },
             "siteCountUQ": { "u" : 10, "q" : -1 },
             "personCountUQ": { "u" : 4, "q": -1 },
             "personIntOnlyCountUQ": { "u" : 3, "q" : -1 }
           },
          "domains":
          [ "acme.com" ]
       }
    }
